show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Host Dr. Eugene Zampieron, ND, AHG, www.drznaturally.com, interviews Dr. Matthew Perchemlides (Dr. “Perch”). Dr. <!--more--> Perch, a licensed Naturopathic Physician, completed his training at the University Of Bridgeport College Of Naturopathic Medicine (UBCNM).
, a four-year CNME accredited Naturopathic Medical School.
Before pursuing Naturopathic Medicine, Dr Perch earned a degree in nursing from Boston College Connell School of Nursing and, while there, traveled to Cuba to research healthcare policy with an emphasis in Pediatric asthma.
Dr Perch completed an acute care medical rotation in a hospital-based setting.
Dr Perch joins us from today from Cancer Centers of America- a unique oncology setting which offers patients an integrative approach care which includes MD’s , Naturopathic Doctors and is supported by a full cast of complimentary services including dieticians, psychologists and acupuncturists.
Contact: www.cancercenter.com
